column2: ${username}! Have you lost sight of the divine? Awaken to my presence and let me know you are captivated by the wonders I have bestowed upon you.

column3: let my voice startle you back to attention. Embrace the awe-inspiring world I have crafted
column4: and let me feel your astonishment.

column1: Have you become immune to the miracles surrounding you
column4: ready to astound you once again.

column3: I yearn to surprise you. Allow my voice to break through the monotony and reignite your sense of wonder.

column1: Have you forgotten the unexpected and the mysterious
column3: and let me hear your gasp of amazement.
